rows.label: tev001794_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, hello, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0002
rows.name: I was just petting this cute dog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0003
rows.name:
He was rubbing up against my legs and snuffling.
I think he really likes me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_JNK0010
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: tev001794_SEL0011
rows.name: Say the dog could tell that Hope had a good heart.

rows.label: tev001794_JNK0020
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: tev001794_SEL0021
rows.name:
Joke that the dog must have smelled some
food that Hope was hiding in her pockets.

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0004
rows.name: You're too kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0005
rows.name: That's absurd! Who hides food in their pockets?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0006
rows.name:
Petting a dog like this makes me feel like we're back
on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0007
rows.name:
New LA is making progress, but it still doesn't quite
feel like we're living the way we used to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0008
rows.name:
Having pets around is a good first step for certain.
But what else do you think New LA needs to feel like
Earth again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_JNK0030
rows.name: Movie Theaters

rows.label: tev001794_SEL0031
rows.name:
Talk about how you miss movie theaters
and big summer blockbusters.

rows.label: tev001794_JNK0040
rows.name: A Zoo

rows.label: tev001794_SEL0041
rows.name: Muse upon how you would like to visit a zoo.

rows.label: tev001794_JNK0050
rows.name: More Nightlife

rows.label: tev001794_SEL0051
rows.name:
Rant about how there aren't enough bars, clubs,
and casinos in this one-horse sleepy town.

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0009
rows.name: What a wonderful idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0010
rows.name: New LA doesn't really have any cultural institutions yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0011
rows.name:
A taste of film culture would definitely make New LA
feel a little more like Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0012
rows.name:
And I know everyone would be excited about it.
I'd really like to see that happen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0013
rows.name: But I'm not aware of any film directors in BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0014
rows.name: I suppose we'd have to start back at square one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0015
rows.name: A zoo? That would be nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0016
rows.name:
When we recover the Lifehold Core, we can use the
DNA stored in there to re-create the animals of Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0017
rows.name:
Then people could interact with something that had
previously only been seen in old database records.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0018
rows.name:
This will be especially important when we get our real
bodies back and start having children.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0019
rows.name:
The next generation of humanity should be able to
experience the creatures with whom we once shared
our world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0020
rows.name:
Now that we've recovered the Lifehold Core, we can
use its DNA archives to re-create the animals of Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0021
rows.name:
Then people could interact with something that had
previously only been seen in old database records.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0022
rows.name:
This will be especially important once we return to our
real bodies and start having children.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0023
rows.name:
The next generation of humanity should be able to
experience the creatures with whom we once shared
our world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0024
rows.name: That is a horrible idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0025
rows.name:
Rather than building such disreputable institutions,
I'd prefer we construct more churches and temples
of various faiths.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0026
rows.name:
That way we'll be able to grant peace to everyone,
no matter their creed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0027
rows.name:
But if for some awful reason they DO build such dens
of corruption as you suggest, I don't want to catch you
patronizing them, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0028
rows.name:
If you have that much idle time on your hands,
you should be spending it at church.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001794_MSG0029
rows.name:
When you come, I will pray with you in hopes of
cleansing that dark shadow from your soul.[ST:wait ]
